title: Memorandum of Understanding between the Ministry of External Affairs  of Sri Lanka and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Uganda on Bilateral Political Consultations, the Agreement on Economic, Commercial and Technical Co-operation and the Memorandum of Understanding on Tourism Cooperation
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. (Prof) G.L. Peiris, Minister of External Affairs to grant covering approval for the above Agreements signed between the two countries, was approved by the Cabinet.
